meanings.sent1: The inelasticities of the old rubber band made it snap easily.
meanings.sent2: Economic inelasticities can lead to price increases without a change in demand.
meanings.sent3: The inelasticities of the stubborn door made it impossible to open without force.
meanings.sent4: Her inelasticities in decision-making were like a wall blocking any compromise.
meanings.sent5: The inelasticities of the frozen rope made it impossible to tie a knot.

meanings.definition: The state of being unyielding or rigid
meanings.sent1: The inelasticities of the frozen ground made it hard to dig.
meanings.sent2: The inelasticities of his beliefs made it challenging to change his mind.
meanings.sent3: The inelasticities of the tree branches made them unbreakable in the storm.
meanings.sent4: Her inelasticities in negotiation were like a brick wall in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The inelasticities of the metal rod made it impossible to bend.
